body.name: Galanz Microwave Oven ExpressWave with Patented Inverter Technology, Sensor Reheat, 10 Variable Power Levels, Express Cooking Knob, 1250W 2.2 Cu Ft Stainless Steel GEWWD22S1SV125
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.

features: 【PATENTED INVERTER TECHNOLOGY】ExpressWave with Inverter technology for faster cooking, reheating, and defrosting. Unlike traditional microwave heating systems that pulse on and off, the inverter creates continuous, constant, even heat to maintain exacting temperature during the cooking process.

【EXPRESS COOKING KNOB】This innovative microwave has a unique Express Cooking Knob that makes everything faster and easier to use. Just turn the knob to select time and then press it, you can start your microwave cooking very quickly.

【SENSOR COOK & SENSOR REHEAT】A built-in humidity sensor ensures that your food is never undercooked or overcooked. For precooked dishes, Sensor Reheat stops automatically when food is hot and ready to eat.

【4 SENSOR COOK PROGRAMS & 7 SENSOR REHEAT PROGRAMS】Easy and fast to cook with 4 sensor cook programs (Fish, Fresh Vegetable, Ground Meat, Oatmeal) and 7 sensor reheat programs (Chili, Frozen Entrée, Frozen Pizza, Mac and Cheese, Mashed Potatoes, Pasta, Rice).

【1250W & 10 VARIABLE POWER LEVELS】Galanz 2.2 Cu.Ft, 1250 Watt microwave oven with 10 variable power levels allows you to adjust the cooking power from 10% to 100%. Its touch-sensitive control panel is designed to be easy to operate, intuitive, and ergonomic.
body.description: Product Features10 Variable Power Levels: 10%-100%Express Cooking Knob for Quick Start CookingPatented Inverter Technology for More Even Cooking Sensor Cook & Sensor Reheat4 Sensor Cook Programs: Fish, Fresh Vegetable, Ground Meat, Oatmeal7 Sensor Reheat Programs: Chili, Frozen Entrée, Frozen Pizza, Mac and Cheese, Mashed Potatoes, Pasta, Rice6 Preset Menus: Popcorn, Beverage, Potato, Frozen Vegetable, Dinner Plate, SoupTime /Weight DefrostKitchen TimerChild Safety Lock+30 SEC FunctionEasy Clean Interior16.56" Glass TurntableSpecificationsCapacity: 2.2 Cu.FtWatts: 1250WVoltage: 120Volts /60HzColor: Black Stainless SteelProduct Dimension: 24.75" W x 19.94" D x 14.19" HInstallation Type: Countertop or Built-In (Trim Kits Not Included)Warranty: 1 Year Limited WarrantyPackage IncludesSensor & Inverter Microwave OvenGlass Turntable with Roller Ring & Shaft

This thoughtful oven reheats and defrosts faster and more evenly with inverter technology cook, which will enrich the cooking during your life. Besides, it offers time defrost as well as weight defrost. Patented Inverter Technology Unlike traditional microwave heating systems that pulse on and off, the inverter creates continuous, constant, even heat to maintain exacting temperature during the cooking process. Popcorn Preset Button Get ready to serve popcorn faster. Sensor Reheat Sensor Cook Patented Inverter Technology Popcorn Preset Button

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: At first the Galanz microwave seemed cheaply made. Compared to my old Maytag, it's very light weight. But, after using it for a about 4 months, I've come to appreciate how it cooks.I replaced same for same. I had an 1100w Maytag oven and I bought the Galanz 1100w oven. I'd have preferred the larger oven, but didn't have the space.This oven cooks in about 2/3 of the time than the old Maytag, but with very notable differences.The weight defrost does a great job and is very accurate. The Maytag always over heated the outside edges, cooking meats, while leaving the center icy. The Galanz does neither. When defrosting 1 pound of meat, it comes out totally defrosted, with NO cooked areas.The potato setting is also very accurate. I weigh the potato(s) before cooking it/them, entering the total weight in ounces. My husband loves baked potatoes, sometimes eating one for lunch. I've cooked monster sized potatoes and small; every one comes out perfectly cooked (without turning over), never overcooked.I've reheated using the sensor reheat, and everything comes out properly reheated, without a cool center, or over cooked outside. I've sensor cooked certain things and have achieved properly cooked good, without over cooking.I knew from other reviews that the light isn't very bright, but that's inconsequential. The microwave cooks accurately without the requirement to constantly watch.The interior is very easy to clean. Nothing sticks to it.The microwave is a very good buy and every function I've used works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: More than what I thought it was going to be. Love it! Very spacious!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Light is nearly non-existent
reviews.reviewText: I really like this microwave. I like spinning the dial to the desired length of time needed and simply pushing the button. It make it very easy instead of finding the correct button to push for the desired number of seconds I need it to run. I only have one complaint and it may not be a big deal for the average buyer. I am one of those people who would like to see into the microwave as it is cooking and spinning, more of an entertainment feature. The light in the microwave is so dim I actually thought it came without a light till I examined it more closely. It has a very dim light and actually serves no purpose when it is operating and actually only serves a purpose when the door is open and the room is dark.Other than that I could not be happier with the microwave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Galant microwave oven
reviews.reviewText: Oven has 1250 watts. Works great has a dial to set time to operate. Only down side to this item is in the description. the size of the unit is not the size of the unit it is the actual size of the box it is shipped in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars 🚫🚫🚫🚫 DO NOT PURCHASE THIS GARBAGE
reviews.reviewText: I bought this microwave on the 12 of March 2021. It worked fine until a week ago,I was in the kitchen when I heard a strange cracking sound. There I behold the microwave glass shattering before my eyes. It was not in use at the time. My child was also cut by the shattered glass. I still don't understand why I would pay over $150 for a microwave that only last for a year. Clearly it's a manufacturer problem and a damm scam. If you purchase this microwave, of course you're going to feel pleased because of the outer appearance but I am sure that in the short run,just like myself you'll be highly disappointed. This was a total waste of money and I expect the seller to issue me with a full refund. I've reached out to them and no one has responded. This product is a safety hazard. I'm warning you,do not purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the knob for easy timing
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Great little microwave for a quick heating only thing is it has no light on the inside

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: About 2x the size of the previous microwave! An absolute steal for the price I paid. It's almost intimidating with all the bells and whistles and very sleek in appearance. My tecky son was fixing meals in it way before I did, but slowly getting accustomed to the different settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well -- the good and the not so good
reviews.reviewText: This oven is exactly as advertised and works well.The good:Large cavity 17.5" wide, 10.25" high, 16.5 to 18" deep (in various places), 16.5" turntable. (This information was hard to find so I measured it for the review).Plenty of power (40% more than the oven it replaces)Great control of power level 10% to 100% ten steps.Simple controls -- just twist knob to set time and push to start. Push button then twist knob to set power level, then push knob, then twist again for time and push to start.Built in timer for whatever you like simultaneous with microwave timing.Lots of other functions I don't use.The not so good:The interior is dark colored, and the internal light is weak so it's hard to see what is going on while cooking. They could fix this! The oven it replaced had a light interior and a brighter light so I could observe things like boiling.The instruction manual refers to a button to stop the turntable, but my unit does not seem to have this ability. It would be nice to have.All in all, I'm happy with it. I really like the lack of numeric keypad. twisting the knob is so much easier.Cooking at high power to soften food and boil off excess water, then at lower power to brown yields even browning which was difficult with only two power settings on my old one. Some microwaves reduce power by turning power on and off at fairly long intervals. This one seems to output lower power continuously when set for low power.I would buy it again.

Me gustó la perilla que en cada giro que das va aumentando gradualmente el tiempo 30 segundos, es bastante amplio, se ve elegante, puede ser que mi cocina tenga mucha iluminación natural y por eso noto que la iluminación de los números en el display es muy tenue para ver durante el día, pero de noche se ve bien.en general lo considero un buen producto que vale mucho la pena comprar. estoy satisfecha
Muy práctica la perilla para poner el tiempo de hornear y también los botones predeterminados para los platillos
